products.title: Windsor Mist Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The windsor mist grey roman blind provides a sophisticated way to style your windows with the practical benefits of a sleek and compact folding design. Marrying a silky feel fabric in a gentle grey hue with a glittering flowing pattern, this modern motif is sure to sparkle. This warm grey blind is a versatile choice that will team well with a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green.

products.title: Windsor Petal Pink Roman Blind
products.description: Sleek and minimalist with a touch of sparkle, the windsor petal pink roman blind is a glamorous option for light control within your home and will suit a range of settings. Reflective, metallic yarns pick out an alluring pattern upon a silky feel, soft pink backdrop that will give your space a subtle touch of decorative pattern. Product id: db-rom1071 fabric colour: petal pink material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Windsor Canvas Roman Blind
products.description: Made from silky-feel, neutral toned fabric and beautifully enriched with strands of metallic yarn, this window blind will make a simple yet sophisticated update for your decor. The windsor canvas roman blind features a lustrous and sparkling finish that is given further richness by the visual effect of the smooth curving pattern. Product id: db-rom1073 fabric colour: canvas material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Windsor, Raspberry - Roman Blind
products.description: In deep, pinky red, with the silky feel of deluxe satin, the windsor raspberry is a classic choice, adding plush homeliness and cosy luxury wherever it hangs. If ever there were a fabric made for the curves of the roman blind, this is the one. Try using the raspberry in a neutral cream or magnolia hallway to add a burst of colour to an often overlooked area of the home that can be much in need of a stylish lift.

products.title: Windsor, Taupe - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft, subtle mocha brown, the windsor taupe is an elegant and sophisticated blind, combining a silky and satiny sheen to complement its pretty colour. Gently raised ribbing provides this otherwise sleek fabric with depth and texture, adding a characterful feel to the blind. The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

products.title: Windsor, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: Vivid and vibrant, the windsor red simply refuses to be missed. Its bold colour suits the soft sheen of the silk-like fabric perfectly, and the cloth is a lightweight yet highly durable one, backed with polycotton sateen lining for long-lasting protection. The red is one for the glamorous, so do it justice by pairing with rich golds for a strikingly eye-catching look that will make your home one of contemporary class.

products.title: Windsor, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

products.title: Windsor, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

products.title: Windsor, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

products.title: Windsor, White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Windsor, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous in soft, vintage gold, the windsor latte is reminiscent of creamy coffee or warm, sticky caramel, making it a delectable and attractive blind. Texture is added to the silky soft fabric using slightly raised ribbing scattered occasionally across its surface. Set the latte against a bold cornflower blue, using it as both a tempering neutral and an highlighting accent to make the blue truly pop.

products.title: Windsor Mist Grey Curtain
products.description: The windsor mist grey curtain boasts a sophisticated design with sleek fabric in a gentle grey hue decorated with a glittering flowing pattern. This fully lined curtain is a versatile choice for a contemporary home and will complement a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green. Product id: db-cur1194 fabric colour: mist grey material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes windsor mist grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Windsor Petal Pink Curtain
products.description: This curtain has a sumptuous appeal with a silky soft-touch, cotton-blend fabric in a gorgeous dusky pink hue. The windsor petal pink curtain is detailed with an intricate wavy design that is textured with metallic yarn for added luxury. This fully lined curtain is will bring a touch of contemporary glamour to any room. Product id: db-cur1193 fabric colour: petal pink material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes windsor petal pink curtain in pink.

products.title: Windsor Canvas Curtain
products.description: Enjoy a dash of contemporary glamour with the windsor canvas curtain. Made from a sleek cotton-blend fabric and beautifully enhanced with strands of metallic yarn in a soft and curving motif, this curtain is sure to sparkle at your window. The pale neutral toned fabric is backed with a full lining, enhancing the look and quality of this curtain. Product id: db-cur1195 fabric colour: canvas material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes windsor canvas curtain in white/cream.
